Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.common.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClientAlreadyRegisteredException
    Indicates that an attempt to register a new client has failed because another client with the same identifier has been found into the server.
    ClientNotRegisteredException
    Indicates that an attempt to refer to an unregistered client was made.
    ClientTimeOutException
    Indicates that a Client's time to answer expired before they gave the answer.
    ConnectionException
    Indicates that an error occurred at the network level.
    GameAlreadyStartedException
    Indicates that an attempt was made to access a Lobby by a Player while the corresponding Game has already been started.
    InvalidPasswordException
    Indicates that an invalid password has been used to try to connect to a specified Lobby.
    InvalidPropertyException
    Indicates that an invalid property was found into the configuration file.
    LobbyAlreadyExistsException
    Indicates that an attempt was made to create a new Lobby with the same identifier of another one already found into the server.
    LobbyEmptyException
    Indicates that an attempt was made to log a Player out from an empty Lobby.
    LobbyFullException
    Indicates that an attempt was made to log a Player into a lobby that has already reached its maximum amount of Players possible.
    LobbyNotFoundException
    Indicates that an attempt was made to access a Lobby that no longer exists and cannot be found into the server collection of Lobby.
    PlayerAlreadyAddedException
    Indicates that an attempt was made to add an already logged Player to the same Lobby more than once.
    PlayerNotFoundException
    Indicates that an attempt was made to refer to a Player that no longer exists on the server.
